ADD_LIBRARY ( FreyaCore ${CORE_SOURCES} )

IF(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
MESSAGE("Building shared version of Freya Core")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(FreyaCore  ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${STLPORT_LIBRARIES} ${SDL_LIBRARY} ${OPENGL_LIBRARY}  ${COREFOUNDATION})
ENDIF(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
